name: Line Simulator
storyline:
Random place. Random person. You go to the store, you have to travel, you feel like dropping by your favorite event... you queue. That sums up the largest percentage of our lives. But that's about to change.
Punch, throw, steal your way to the front of the line. Find new and bizarre ways to skip the line in five environments. Explore the halls of a convention, push your way to the front of a supermarket queue, and discover that not everything is what it seems.
summary: Punch, throw, steal your way to the front of the line in Line Simulator! Find new and bizarre ways to skip the line in five unique environments. Explore the halls of a convention, push your way to the front of a supermarket queue, and discover that not everything is what it seems in this wacky game!
